channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Letters To Santa
channel.desc: When young siblings receive a magic pen from Santa that appears to be granting wishes, they ask for their separated parents to be reunited.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Lot Like Christmas
channel.desc: The owner of the most popular Christmas tree lot in Hudson Springs finds her business in jeopardy when a big-city marketing executive arrives with a chain store. Seasonal romance.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Mistletoe Secret
channel.desc: Seasonal romance following a ghost writer who arrives in a small town before Christmas and falls for the local Mistletoe Diner's owner.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Three Wiser Men And A Boy
channel.desc: The Brenner brothers are back and putting on a holiday pageant for young Thomas, while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mum's new boyfriend.[(96057)]
